00066   class PDB : public AtomicGroup {
00067   public:
00068     class BadConnectivity : public std::runtime_error {
00069     public:
00070       explicit BadConnectivity(const std::string& msg) : runtime_error(msg) { };
00071     };
00072 
00073   public:
00074     PDB() : _show_charge(false), _auto_ter(true), _has_cryst(false), strictness_policy(false) { }
00075     virtual ~PDB() {}
00076 
00078     explicit PDB(const std::string fname) : _show_charge(false), _auto_ter(true),
00079                                             _has_cryst(false), strictness_policy(false) {
00080       std::ifstream ifs(fname.c_str());
00081       if (!ifs)
00082         throw(std::runtime_error("Cannot open PDB file " + fname));
00083       read(ifs);
00084     }
00085 
00087     explicit PDB(const char* fname) : _show_charge(false), _auto_ter(true),
00088                                       _has_cryst(false), strictness_policy(false) {
00089       std::ifstream ifs(fname);
00090       if (!ifs)
00091         throw(std::runtime_error("Cannot open PDB file " + std::string(fname)));
00092       read(ifs);
00093     }
00094 
00096     explicit PDB(std::ifstream& ifs) : _show_charge(false), _auto_ter(true),
00097                                        _has_cryst(false), strictness_policy(false) { read(ifs); }
00098 
00099 
00101     virtual PDB* clone(void) const;
00102 
00104     PDB copy(void) const;
00105 
00107 
00111     static PDB fromAtomicGroup(const AtomicGroup&);
00112 
00113     bool showCharge(void) const;
00115     void showCharge(bool b = true);
00116 
00117     bool strict(void) const;
00119     void strict(const bool b);
00120 
00121     bool autoTerminate(void) const;
00122 
00124 
00127     void autoTerminate(bool b = true);
00128 
00130     Remarks& remarks(void);
00132     void remarks(const Remarks&);
00133 
00134     const UnitCell& unitCell(void);
00135     void unitCell(const UnitCell&);
00136 
00138     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream&, PDB&);
00139 
00141     void read(std::istream& is);
00142 
00143   private:
00144 
00146     PDB(const AtomicGroup& grp) : AtomicGroup(grp), _show_charge(false), _auto_ter(true), _has_cryst(false) { }
00147 
00148     bool emptyString(const std::string&);
00149 
00150     // These will modify the PDB upon a successful parse...
00151     void parseRemark(const std::string&);
00152     void parseAtomRecord(const std::string&);
00153     void parseConectRecord(const std::string&);
00154     void parseCryst1Record(const std::string&);
00155 
00156     // Convert an Atom to a string representation in PDB format...
00157     std::string atomAsString(const pAtom p) const;
00158 
00159     friend std::ostream& FormatConectRecords(std::ostream&, PDB&);
00160 
00161   private:
00162     bool _show_charge;
00163     bool _auto_ter;
00164     bool _has_cryst;
00165     bool strictness_policy;
00166     Remarks _remarks;
00167     UnitCell cell;
00168 
00169   };
